property.name: mediacaption
property.value: U.S. Air Force photo by Senior Airman Marianique Santos

note.text: The Air Force uses the Twelve Domains of Culture framework to discuss culture. The twelve domains are:

- family and kinship
- sex and gender
- sustenance and health
- religion and spirituality
- political and social relations
- economics and resources
- history and myth
- learning and knowledge
- technology and material
- aesthetics and recreation
- language and communication
- time and space
